titleStmt.title: [Meteorologia, or, The true way of foreseeing and judging the inclination of the air and alteration of the weather in several regions ... by William Cock ...].
titleStmt.author: Cock, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Conyers at the Black Raven in Duck Lane,
